text: Geronimo is a character in the Geronimo Stilton series. He is the publisher of the Rodent's Gazeete. According to himself, the real creator is Edizoni Piemme, who once published the Italian books by Piemme/Junior. There are many books of his series. One of them is All Because of a Cup of Coffee. == Books == Lost Treasure of the Emerald Eye The Curse of the Cheese Pyramid Cat and Mouse in a Haunted House I'm Too Fond of My Fur! Four Mice Deep in the Jungle Paws Off, Cheddarface!
